version_description: Bug fixes
We’re making it even easier to curl up with the one you love – Netflix. Or with a person who’s also watching Netflix. That works too.

Want a fun, easy way to find something to watch? We've got you sorted. Mobile Previews let you swipe or tap through quick videos of our series and films to find your new fave even faster.

Grab your cluster. Update the app. The Sense8 Series Finale is out now, worldwide. <3
Harlem’s defender is ready. So is the latest update. This version brings you performance improvements for watching Luke Cage Season 2 and all our latest titles.
Want to watch Netflix on your phone while dad watches on the TV and grandma watches on her tablet? Live the dream. Just make sure you have the latest update.

Get ready to change how you watch things with our new video player.

* New forward and back 10-second buttons make it easy to jump to the exact point you want to. Pro tip: double-tap on the left or right side of the screen while watching to instant

我们努力改善 App 体验，您决定要观看的内容、观看时间以及观看方式。这两件事情都非常重要。

我们知道您想尽情挑选。我们在此版本中，改进了片库，让您可以更轻松地找到完美观赏内容。

想要和爸爸、奶奶分别使用手机、电视和平板电脑一起观看 Netflix 内容吗？只需安装最新更新，即可美梦成真。

而且，我们在此版本中专为您修复了错误并提升了性能。

Want to watch Netflix on your phone while dad watches on the TV and grandma watches on her tablet? Live the dream. Just make sure you have the latest update.

And in this release, we've fixed bugs and made performance improvements. Just for you.

您忧心于寻找接下来要观看的精彩影片，而我们则马不停蹄地努力帮您改进观看体验。

无论您心情如何，我们都有符合您心境的影片。我们在此版本中改进了播放器，为您提供更好的播放体验。

有人在公交车上偷瞄您的 Netflix App？那您一定要确保自己用的是最新最棒的应用版本。下载更新，畅享最出色的观看体验。

在此版本中，我们专门为您修复了错误并增强了性能。

想要和爸爸、奶奶分别使用手机、电视和平板电脑一起观看 Netflix 内容吗？只需安装最新更新，即可美梦成真。

而且，我们在此版本中专为您修复了错误并提升了性能。
